mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id FROM fnd_user u where u.user_name = #{userCode}
SELECT u.user_id,u.user_name FROM fnd_user u where u.user_name like '%${userName}%' limit #{startIndex},#{perPage}
select count(1) from fnd_user u where u.user_name like '%${userName}%'
SELECT f.func_id,f.func_name from fnd_auth a ,fnd_user u ,fnd_func f where a.user_id = u.USER_ID and a.func_id = f.func_id and u.USER_NAME = #{userName} and a.auth_type = 'webFunc' and f.func_pid = 0

SELECT f.func_id,f.func_pid,f.func_name from fnd_auth a ,fnd_user u ,fnd_func f where a.user_id = u.USER_ID and a.func_id = f.func_id and u.USER_NAME = #{userName} and a.auth_type = 'webFunc' and f.valid=1 order by f.func_id asc,f.func_pid asc
SELECT f.func_id,f.func_pid,f.func_name from fnd_func f where f.func_pid!=0 and f.func_type='web' and f.valid=1 order by f.func_id asc,f.func_pid asc
